'''Primrose Bracegirdle, née Boffin''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Primrose was the daughter of [[Otto Boffin]] and [[Lavender Grubb]]. She married [[Blanco Bracegirdle]] and had two children, [[Bruno Bracegirdle|Bruno]] in {{SR|1313}} and [[Lobelia Sackville-Baggins|Lobelia]] in {{SR|1318}}.<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>

==Etymology==
[[wikipedia:Primula vulgaris|Primrose]] (from Latin ''primula'' and English ''rose'') are plants of the [[wikipedia:primula|primula]] genus of the [[wikipedia:Primulaceae|primrose family]].
